entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING ENDED, Colville Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:13 AM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 32.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Ice fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 32. Wind chill minus 46 this morning and minus 41 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 30 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 30 by morning. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 26. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 27. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 24.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 24. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 34.
